abilities.name: Wall Climb
abilities.description: Hanzo can climb any vertical surface.

abilities.name: Lunge
abilities.description: Press jump while in the air to leap horizontally

abilities.name: Storm Bow
abilities.description: Hanzo nocks and fires an arrow at his target. Can headshot.

abilities.name: Sonic Arrow
abilities.description: Hanzo launches an arrow that contains a sonar tracking device. Any enemy within its detection radius is visibly marked, making them easier for Hanzo and his allies to hunt down. Arrow itself does the same damage as Storm Bow, and can also headshot.

abilities.name: Storm Arrows
abilities.description: Hanzo’s next several arrows fire instantly, and can richochet once, but at reduced damage. Can headshot.

abilities.name: Dragonstrike
abilities.description: Hanzo summons a Spirit Dragon which travels through the air in a line. It passes through walls in its way, devouring any enemies it encounters.
